title: PayPal
author: VD
content_html: Something about PayPal always bothered me… I started to sign up for it once but I let my account lapse without ever using it. I was planning to take out a blogad for one of my books and decided to do a little due diligence before signing up for a PayPal account. This detailed account from an ex-employee has convinced me to pass on it. I won’t sign up for anything that gives the contract writer this abusive power in the fine print.
